Sanitarium Post Office, Napa County, California 
                                                February 12, 1907 

To the Workers in the Paradise Valley Sanitarium 

Dear Brethren and Sisters: 


     The past night has been one of wakefulness and prayer. I am anxious to understand the ways of the Lord, and to know what words I should speak to those who are in charge of the Paradise Valley Sanitarium.
